name: XWUI Transition Component
description: Animation wrapper component for enter/exit transitions. Supports fade, slide, scale, grow, and collapse transition types with customizable duration, easing, directions, and mount/unmount behaviors. Useful for animated content appearance and disappearance.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

appear.description: Whether to run transition on initial mount

unmountOnExit.description: Whether to remove from DOM when exited

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the transition wrapper

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

children.description: Content element or HTML string to animate

content.description: Content element or HTML string (alias for children)
